description.displayText: Maddie was incredible when we hired her to care for our 4 month old baby. She was extremely dependable and took such great care of her over the last few months. It made going back to work as a first time mom so much easier knowing I could rely on her. We're so sad to end our time with Maddie but my husband is taking his leave and then she will be going to daycare. We will definitely stay in touch for any future baby sitting opportunities!
